sendAttackCommand() - Method in class BattleClient
This method validates it is the client's turn, the selected ship belongs to the clietn, and the selected button is not null.
sendMoveCommand() - Method in class BattleClient
This method validates that it is the client's turn, the selected ship belongs to the client, and the selected JButton is not null then sends a move command with two position to the server to validate
